"Je vous aime!" 
he said, remembering what has to be said at such moments: but his words sounded so weak that he felt ashamed of him- self. 
Six weeks later he was married, and settled in Count Beziikhov's large, newly furnished Pe- tersburg house, the happy possessor, as people said, of a wife who was a celebrated beauty and of millions of money.
